content: "Oh. Precious. Okay. Okay. I'll live up to that, I will. I mean, I'll try to, but I will. Oh, God. I thought maybe you would go. I thought maybe you'd made your mind up to go already..."

"You're right. You're right, I suppose. If you can't know what I've done... then I have to be more than good. I have to appear to be good as well. And so do you. We can try, can't we? Try to be honest, and look honest, at the same time?"
That's the stupid thing about all this. You can't ever know for certain, no matter what anyone tells you. There's no way to prove what happened in that room. There never will be.
"Do you? You should, you know.
"I can't apologise. I can't, because I didn't do anything wrong."

content.option: "How can I know that for sure?"

content: "I never wanted to hurt you. You must know that, at least."
/=A silent smile. A nod.=/
"Am I? I guess I'll have to be happy with that, won't I? It's the closest thing to compliment I'm likely to get here. But you know what? You're paranoid.
"Told you what? There's nothing to tell.
/=Curtain falls=/
"Good idea. Don't spoil it."/==/

I know... I you're angry with me. And it's all a misunderstanding. You know that, right? All of this is one big mistake. I know what you heard but it isn't true. I've never been unfaithful to you. You've got to believe that's true."

content.option: "I'm not sure of that at all."

content: "I'm glad you could make it. I didn't think... I didn't think you were coming."
"What do you see? Look. What do you see?"
/=A finger on your lips.=/
"I see. I see. Well, it seems your mind is made up. Thank you for coming to tell me yourself."

content.option: "I had to see you once more."

content: "Yeah, you're right. I shouldn't have worried. Only,

"But it /=is=/ about you. It's about whether you trust me, or not. That's /=all=/ it's about. It's not even about what I've done. I haven't done anything, but that doesn't matter. All that matters is what you believe about me."

content.option: "We're over. It's as simple as that."

content: "So you don't trust me. After everything, you still don't. How long have we known each other? How long were we... I don't know. Is there anything I could have done to make you trust me?"

content.option: "I don't know. I just don't know."

content: "It all comes down to /=now=/. What you see when you look in my eyes. Do you see a liar and a cheat, or do you see your friend? Your very best friend? Look me in the eyes, now. Tell me what you see."
"All right. That's the best we can do. And I'll try too.
"How could it not matter?"

content.option: "We're over. It's that simple. I came to say goodbye."
"I can't ever know. I'll just have to trust you."

content: "You do? Maybe you do. I can't tell any better than you can tell about me.
"Shh. Don't spoil it."/==/
"I don't know. I don't know how anyone can trust anyone. You just have to try, I suppose. You have to want to. Do you want to?"
"Don't say that. Don't say that. If you say that, I can't ever change your mind. You won't ever be able to trust me again."

"You think so? No, you don't. You're just saying that. You'd say whatever to make sure I don't cry, wouldn't you? That's why you wanted to meet here. Somewhere /=public=/, so I wouldn't cry. Well, bad luck. If you're horrible to me I won't be able to stop myself and then everyone in this bar will be looking at you like you're a criminal."

content.option: "I'm not the one who's done anything wrong."
"I won't be horrible. I just need to know the truth."

content: "I did. I did, only you don't believe me. Please. Look me in the eyes.
"That's okay. You're here now. I just...
"Then this is how you can remember me. As someone you didn't know. That you never really knew, and you never trusted. I hope you enjoy the memory."
"What do you mean? What else can I do?"

"Oh, God. How did I end up like this? I should never have let myself get dependent on you. I had a good job, I had friends, and now what have I got? You've broken me in two, and now you don't even trust me."
Nothing happened. Nothing!"
"But you will? I mean, you'll try?"

content.option: "I do. It's too late for me."

content: "Never.
"Don't say that. Say /=never=/.
"Where would I be without you?"
"What do you mean?"

content.option: "We're over. I'm here to tell you that."

content: My darling.
"How could you /=ever=/ know for sure? Of course you can't.
